snippet.title: Apocryphauna - Official Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Available now on itch.io for FREE (or pay what you want):
https://valerie-dusk.itch.io/apocryphauna

There's something wrong with you. You've been sent away to a private boarding school so they can fix you. If that weren't bad enough, they took away your entire collection of Apocryphauna trading cards. If you want to rebuild your collection, you'll have to be careful. If they catch you again, the punishment will be so much worse.

After all, the nuns think this game is evil — that playing with these cards can summon Discordia, the mother of all demons.  But that's not true. It's just a game... right?

Apocryphauna was created for Indiepocalypse 295:
https://itch.io/queue/c/689872/indiepocalypse?game_id=1522326

Writing and 2D art by Claire Mulkerin
Itch: https://clairemulkerin.itch.io
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ClaireMulkerin

Programming and 3D modeling by Valerie Dusk 
Itch: https://valerie-dusk.itch.io
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ValerieDusk

Folks who contributed additional card art: 
Valerie Paris (https://valerie-paris.itch.io)
Quinn K. (https://quinnk.itch.io)
Nikki Kalpa (https://thefifthkalpa.itch.io)
Melissa (https://theboneforest.com)
JoJo Seames (https://jojoseames.com)

Music by: Hashme Lloyd
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCOt-QvfYS43dw2Z1FRWaizA
Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/artist/3bDmT2aRMmRNAovvhtCZ58

Content Warning: contains depictions of transphobia, homophobia, religious extremism, and child abuse, along with brief violent and tryphopobic imagery.
